item.title: HaloKid
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

army_life:

No ignorant is making pointless posts like this [quote]No, it proves you and him are accidents.[/quote] when you do not even know me and saying im an accident’ obviously if you have to say things like this you are covering up that you parents did not hug you enough so you are here to try to make posts like that to make yourself feel better. It was not a ignorant post your post was unnecessary as I was acknowledging that he did a good job making the suit out of lego’s.

Holy Crap! How long did it take you to write that? Did you get help from your illegitimate parents?

Read full topic

It was not a ignorant post your post was unnecessary as I was acknowledging that he did a good job making the suit out of lego’s.
[/quote]
